column1: # description: Click the info button on the zoo page to see the figure. Two force sensors, F1 and F2, at the same height, are connected by a string. A mass hangs from the string. The string is longer than the distance between the sensors, so it hangs down, forming a triangle. The distances from the sensors to the  mass are X1 and X2. The mass is "h" meters below the horizontal.

column2: description: force from the other sensor
description: distance from sensor 1 to the mass
description: distance from sensor 2 to the mass
description: vertical distance from the horizontal down to the mass (i.e., a leg where the distances X1 and X2 are hypotenuses)
